84700.summary: Some customers in the Guildford area of New Westminster are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
84700.title: Nov 17 - New Westminster (Guildford) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
